positive_examples: This is an example of amphibious assault.
The amphibious assault demonstrated clear characteristics.
We observed amphibious assault in this context.
A typical case of amphibious assault would involve these features.
The concept of amphibious assault applies here.
A military assault launched from the sea against a shore or coastal target using naval and ground forces.
negative_examples: This is an example of direct assault, not amphibious assault.
This represents military assault in general.
The document was filed in the cabinet.
She walked to the store to buy groceries.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: DirectAssault, or other types of MilitaryAssault

definition: A military attack launched from sea onto land.
